testcase.name: Test to search data for a particular module and tenant
testcase.system-out: * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def searchMdmsConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/searchMdms.yaml') . passed * def commonConstants = read('../../common-services/constants/genericConstants.yaml') . passed * def moduleName = searchMdmsConstant.parameters.moduleName[0] ............ passed * def name = searchMdmsConstant.parameters.name[0] ........................ passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/mdmsService.feature@searchMdmsSuccessfully') . passed * match searchMdmsResponseBody == '#present' .............................. passed

testcase.name: Test by passing invalid/non existent or null value for tenant id
testcase.system-out: * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def searchMdmsConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/searchMdms.yaml') . passed * def commonConstants = read('../../common-services/constants/genericConstants.yaml') . passed * def moduleName = searchMdmsConstant.parameters.moduleName[0] ............ passed * def name = searchMdmsConstant.parameters.name[0] ........................ passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/mdmsService.feature@searchMdmsSuccessfully') . passed * match searchMdmsResponseBody == '#present' .............................. passed * def jsUtils = read('classpath:com/egov/utils/jsUtils.js') ............... passed * def searchMdmsConstant = read('../../core-services/constants/searchMdms.yaml') . passed * def commonConstants = read('../../common-services/constants/genericConstants.yaml') . passed * def moduleName = searchMdmsConstant.parameters.moduleName[0] ............ passed * def name = searchMdmsConstant.parameters.name[0] ........................ passed * def tenantId = commonConstants.invalidParameters.invalidTenantId ........ passed * call read('../../core-services/pretests/mdmsService.feature@searchMdmsWithInvalidtenantIdError') . passed * assert searchMdmsResponseBody.Errors[0].message == searchMdmsConstant.errorMessages.invalidTenantid . passed
